zwave\/dlink.dchz110_-_3en1_Ouverture.md.Ils sont conçus pour être placés sur une: They are designed to be placed on a door or window with the magnet fixed on the opening part and the detector on the fixed part
zwave\/dlink.dchz110_-_3en1_Ouverture.md.L'ouverture de la porte ou de la fenêtre: Opening the door or window will move the magnet away from the detector, which will trigger the detector which will send a Z-Wave alarm signal, if the system is armed (this signal can be operated by a siren or by a home automation box for example

zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Le micromodule FGR-222 va vous permettre: The FGR-222 micromodule will allow you to manage the shutter motorizations with electronic stop, the Venetian blinds or even the garage doors thanks to the Z-Wave protocol while keeping your existing switch
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Vous allez donc pouvoir actionner le mot: You will therefore be able to activate the connected motor using the existing switch, a Z-Wave transmitter or directly from the button on the micromodule
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.De plus, ce micromodule est capable de t: In addition, this micromodule is capable of transmitting the instantaneous (W) and cumulative (KWh) electrical consumption of the equipment attached to it
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Un contrôleur Z-Wave (télécommande, dong: A Z-Wave controller (remote control, dongle…) is necessary in order to integrate this module into your network if you already have an existing network
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Chaque module Z-Wave fonctionne comme un: Each Z-Wave module works like a wireless repeater with the other modules, to ensure total coverage of your home
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Ce module nécessite le neutre pour fonct: This module requires neutral to operate
zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Commandez vos stores ou volets roulants: Control your blinds or roller shutters remotely

zwave\/fibaro.fgr222_-_Volets.md.Compatible avec les moteurs à butée méca: Compatible with motors with mechanical or electronic stop

zwave\/greenwave.Powernode1_-_Prise.md.Le module prise PowerNode de GreenWave e: GreenWave's PowerNode plug module is a smart device that connects to one of your home appliances and electronics to allow you to monitor and control power consumption remotely via a web browser or smartphone

zwave\/greenwave.Powernode1_-_Prise.md.Cette prise commandée vous permet égalem: This controlled outlet also allows you to activate or deactivate the device remotely via a web browser or smartphone or to define a calendar to automatically activate or deactivate your device at predefined times

zwave\/greenwave.Powernode1_-_Prise.md.La prise commandée PowerNode dispose aus: The PowerNode controlled socket also has a light status indicator which gives different information depending on its color

zwave\/greenwave.Powernode1_-_Prise.md.Le module prise PowerNode est équipé d'u: PowerNode plug module is equipped with overcurrent protection to protect the connected device

zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.SwiidInter est le premier interrupteur s: SwiidInter is the first cord switch in the Z-Wave home automation environment that is small and discreet enough to be comparable to an ordinary cord switch

zwave\/swiid.inter_-_Interrupteur_Cordon.Il doit ensuite être configuré pour s'in: It must then be configured to integrate into a Z-Wave "network", this network can be as simple as a single remote control which controls your SwiidInter switch remotely
